document_data.mainbody:
lihan Duskflight was a high elf who lived in New Sharandar during the late 15 century of the Faerûnian calendar.
He worked under Pelendethas Everstride, aiding with the efforts to retake the Blighted Grove from the forces of the dark fey led by King Malabog.
Circa the  , Alihan worked with some adventurers from the Sword Coast North region of Faerûn to cull the number of beasts that had overrun the Blighted Grove. He also strived to heal the natural life that had been corrupted by the forces of Malabog. He had a specific salve that helped heal local wildlife, and had others destroy that plant life that was too far gone to save.
